text: There ’ s a brand new royal model in town, and by the looks of his likes on social media, people have already taken notice! According to Denmark - based agency Scoop Models ’ Instagram account, Prince Nikolai of Denmark, son of Prince Joachim and Alexandra, Countess of Frederiksborg, recently signed a contact with the agency. In a series of headshots, which were posted yesterday by the company, the model appears calm, cool, and collected while posing in a grey sweatshirt and jeans. The images are already flooding with comments regarding the 18 - year - old ’ s curly hair and good looks. Nikolai, who walked the runway at the Burberry show during London Fashion Week, made his catwalk debut while dressed in the designer from head - to - toe. Like this : Like Loading.
